queryName: RAM account password policy does not enforce minimum password length
descriptionText: The RAM account password policy must define `minimum_password_length` and set it to `14` or greater. If the attribute is missing, the policy is non-compliant and should include `minimum_password_length = 14`. This rule reports `IncorrectValue` when the attribute is defined but below `14`, and `MissingAttribute` when it is not defined.
